Package calculator

Class Calculator

java.lang.Object
calculator.Calculator
Direct Known Subclasses:
MemoryCalculator
public class Calculator extends Object
This class represents the core logic of a Calculator. It can be used to print and evaluate arithmetic expressions.
Author:
tommens
